name: v1.8.3
body:
## What's Changed
* Made -nostdlib depend on exception support (fixes missing atomic symbols) by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/913
* Backport `_UPT_ptrauth_insn_mask` fixes to v1.8-stable by @phongn in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/899
* Fix off-by-one in aarch64 unw_backtrace() by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/918


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.8.2...v1.8.3

name: v1.8.2
body:
This is a bugfix release.

## What's Changed
* Rework inline aarch64 as for setcontext by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/770
* Fixed miscompilation of unw_getcontext() on ARM by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/862
* Support `-mbranch-protection=pac-ret` on aarch64 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/861
* Add unw_is_plt_entry() to public API (fixes FTBFS on QNX) by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/774
* Fix signal handling for QNX aarch64 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/863


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.8.1...v1.8.2

name: v1.8.1
body:
Small bugfix release of libunwind 1.8.

One of the functional changes is that the testsuite is now installed with a `make install`, which may affect downstream packagers. By default these executables are installed in `${libexecdir}/libunwind` where `${libexecdir}` defaults to `${prefix}/libexec`, but all this can be set explicitly though arguments to `configure`.

## What's Changed
* Fix issue #713 by @cshung in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/717
* Add do-release script by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/725
* Backport dotnet-runtime fixes to the 1.8 branch by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/726
* [v1.8] Make tests installable by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/722
* Bump version to 1.8.1 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/727


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.8.0...v1.8.1

name: v1.8.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Improve unwinding through a bad function pointer on x86_64. by @EmployedRussian in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/449
* Fix `single-bit-bitfield-constant-conversion` warning by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/457
* Remove mailing list information by @bkmgit in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/463
* Fix UMRs indicated by valgrind (x86_64) by @peadar in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/454
* Remove unneeded check by @bkmgit in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/466
* fix byte_order_is_valid function logic by @he7850 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/445
* Use size_t to match R.H.S by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/455
* Move get_proc_info_in_range under dwarf/ by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/460
* Bump actions/checkout@v2 to @v3 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/469
* dwarf_find_unwind_table: Find load_base correctly when current segment does not start at segbase by @BobIsOnFire in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/456
* Add introspection for march=armv8-a+sve by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/471
* Add refined read-only permissions to CI actions by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/476
* Conditionally handle differing struct fpreg layout on FreeBSD armv7 by @rcmcdonald91 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/478
* src/Gtrace: remove unguarded print() calls by @rossburton in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/483
* Linux: Make `get_elf_image` guaranteed AS-safe by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/485
* Rework CI-unix.yml to add clang by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/472
* Provide syscall wrappers for `mmap` and `munmap` by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/486
* Allow to use a custom `dl_iterate_phdr` implementation by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/490
* aarch64: unw_step() validates address before calling dwarf_get by @he7850 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/494
* doc: Add manpage for unw_set_iterate_phdr_function by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/497
* Fix unused variable warning by @michalbiesek in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/498
* Provide AS-safe allocator to LZMA by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/484
* Rework register load in aarch64_local_resume() by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/503
* Add manpage for libunwind-coredump by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/496
* Make Debug() signal-safe by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/506
* Handle edge case in aarch64 tdep_trace() by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/504
* Update to rc2 by @bkmgit in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/468
* don't override sp on arm and mips64 by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/481
* Fix NO_PTRACE_TEST conditions by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/500
* Skip test-ptrace tests if ptrace() returns an error by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/507
* Some fixes for FreeBSD by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/508
* Freebsd x86_64 fix by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/509
* Fix reversed logic in Debug() by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/511
* temporarily XFAIL [GL]arm64-test-sve-signal tests by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/513
* Add a step limit to Ltest-init-local-signal.c by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/517
* Fix arm postdecrement by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/518
* Fix FTBFS on Linux ppc32 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/521
* Improve check to see if libgcc_s is needed by @mmayer in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/523
* Fix test-init-local-signal for FreeBSD. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/525
* Fix build warnings for aarch64-linux targets by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/524
* Temporarily XFAIL Ltest-cxx-exceptions for riscv by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/532
* rebased FreeBSD signal frame unwind request by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/534
* Bump mainline to 1.8-pre by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/527
* Fix test-ptrace on x86-linux target by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/533
* Reduce compile-time warnings on FreeBSD/x86_64 by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/541
* Reduce compile-time warnings. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/544
* Fix x64-unwind-badjmp-signal-frame test for FreeBSD. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/545
* Two fixes for setjmp library on FreeBSD by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/546
* Improve test-ptrace portability by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/549
* Make use of -lpthreads autodetected by configury by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/542
* Eliminate x86_64 build warnings by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/550
* Fixes for FreeBSD/i386 by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/554
* Configure -lpthread always for FreeBSD by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/558
* Add new mi function unw_address_is_valid() by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/536
* Port to QNX 7.0 and later by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/551
* Introduce a new OS specific unw_step() function on x86_64. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/567
* Fix uc_addr() for FreeBSD/Aarch64. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/570
* ignore tests/[GL]arm64-test-sve-signal by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/573
* Fix a typo, back unw_resume tests. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/575
* Improve test-mem-validate, 2nd by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/574
* Improve unw_step fallback method on Aarch64. by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/571
* Remove tilegx as a target by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/568
* Added support for unwinding through PPC64 PLT entries. by @kenche-linaro in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/555
* Fix run-ptrace-mapper test case failed by allowing unw_get_proc_info(… by @ziyangc97 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/576
* tests/mapper: avoid calling printf between SIGUSR1 and SIGUSR2 by @he7850 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/578
* Fix array indexing bug in dwarf_search_unwind_table by @sfc-gh-bhannel in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/579
* Series of changes for FreeBSD/Aarch64 resume by @lemul in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/577
* Add direct dependent libraries to remotes by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/587
* Fix make install by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/593
* typos by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/594
* Fix bad git merge in src/Makefile.am by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/596
* Use pthread_sigmask instead of sigprocmask by @kenche-linaro in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/598
* Create Security Policy by @joycebrum in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/480
* Improved AArch64 is_plt_entry implementation by @kenche-linaro in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/599
* Try debuglink if get proc name fail on coredump by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/601
* Fallback to direct access instead of through /proc/[pid]/root/ by @happyCoder92 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/602
* Add support to look for debug libraries via the build-id by @robertwhitton in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/605
* Fix lose caller frame of kernel call on QNX aarch64 by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/607
* Fix unaligned memory accesses in */Ginit.c by @sfc-gh-sgiesecke in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/608
* Fix FTBFS on PPC by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/613
* Move man pages into section 3libunwind by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/606
* Try lookup symbol from DYNAMIC segment by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/610
* Get filename and offset from ip by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/612
* Fix maps leak if caller's pathlen is too small by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/616
* Adjust DYNAMIC addrs in loaded image by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/621
* Fix crash in elf_w(valid_object) on QNX by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/622
* Import config.h before dwarf-config.h. by @giomasce in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/617
* Fix segfault on QNX x86_64 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/618
* Bump SONAME to 8.1.0 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/619
* Add GitHub workflow automation for code analysis and issue grooming by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/641
* Fix build on FreeBSD i386 by @sunpoet in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/645
* Ensure that structs are not empty by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/655
* Fix scan_hex() logic error by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/657
* Fixed local variable hiding a global variable by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/656
* Remove include/x86/jmpbuf.h by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/664
* Further improvements to unw_step fallback method on AArch64. by @kenche-linaro in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/638
* Fix test-async-sig on x86-linux by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/666
* Fix edge condition in unw_address_is_valid by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/662
* Add header guard to setjmp_i.h by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/668
* Use header for test function prototype by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/669
* configure.ac: fix bashism in LDFLAGS append by @thesamesam in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/676
* FreeBSD/x86_64 fixes by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/695
* Release 1.8.0 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/697

## New Contributors
* @EmployedRussian made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/449
* @bkmgit made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/463
* @peadar made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/454
* @he7850 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/445
* @BobIsOnFire made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/456
* @rcmcdonald91 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/478
* @rossburton made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/483
* @michalbiesek made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/498
* @mmayer made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/523
* @kenche-linaro made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/555
* @ziyangc97 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/576
* @sfc-gh-bhannel made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/579
* @iDings made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/601
* @happyCoder92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/602
* @robertwhitton made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/605
* @sfc-gh-sgiesecke made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/608
* @giomasce made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/617
* @sunpoet made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/645

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.7.2...v1.8.0

* Fix lose caller frame of kernel call on QNX aarch64 by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/607
* Fix unaligned memory accesses in */Ginit.c by @sfc-gh-sgiesecke in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/608
* Fix FTBFS on PPC by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/613
* Move man pages into section 3libunwind by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/606
* Try lookup symbol from DYNAMIC segment by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/610
* Get filename and offset from ip by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/612
* Fix maps leak if caller's pathlen is too small by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/616
* Adjust DYNAMIC addrs in loaded image by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/621
* Fix crash in elf_w(valid_object) on QNX by @iDings in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/622
* Import config.h before dwarf-config.h. by @giomasce in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/617
* Fix segfault on QNX x86_64 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/618
* Bump SONAME to 8.1.0 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/619
* Add GitHub workflow automation for code analysis and issue grooming by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/641
* Fix build on FreeBSD i386 by @sunpoet in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/645
* Ensure that structs are not empty by @bertwesarg in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/655
* Fix scan_hex() logic error by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/657
* Fixed local variable hiding a global variable by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/656
* Remove include/x86/jmpbuf.h by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/664
* Further improvements to unw_step fallback method on AArch64. by @kenche-linaro in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/638
* Fix test-async-sig on x86-linux by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/666
* Fix edge condition in unw_address_is_valid by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/662
* Add header guard to setjmp_i.h by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/668
* Use header for test function prototype by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/669

## New Contributors
* @EmployedRussian made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/449
* @bkmgit made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/463
* @peadar made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/454
* @he7850 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/445
* @BobIsOnFire made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/456
* @rcmcdonald91 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/478
* @rossburton made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/483
* @michalbiesek made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/498
* @lemul made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/508
* @mmayer made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/523
* @kenche-linaro made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/555
* @ziyangc97 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/576
* @sfc-gh-bhannel made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/579
* @joycebrum made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/480
* @iDings made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/601
* @happyCoder92 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/602
* @robertwhitton made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/605
* @sfc-gh-sgiesecke made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/608
* @giomasce made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/617
* @sunpoet made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/645

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.7.0-rc2...v1.8.0-rc1

name: v1.7.2
body:
Fixes two bugs reported by downstreams and uses correct signing key.

## What's Changed
* Don't override sp on arm and mips64 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/585
* Add direct dependent libraries to remotes by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/588
* Bump to release 1.7.2 by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/589

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2

name: v1.7.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Bump to release 1.7.1 to fix source tarball naming issue


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

name: Libunwind v1.7.0
body:
# libunwind release 1.7.0

This is a mostly-bugfixes release.

## What's Changed
* Makefile.am: Add missing riscv header to noinst by @zhaofengli in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/290
* Fix the build on FreeBSD by @ararslan in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/295
* Correct some issues in documentation by @bjosv in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/298
* DWARF: dwarf4 fix cie parsing by @djwatson in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/266
* x86_64: Stop aliasing RSP and CFA by @ararslan in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/296
* Prefer EXTBL unwinding on ARM by @ararslan in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/297
* [GCC pedantic] Fix "error: comma at end of enumerator list" when linking to libunwind by @iarspider in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/303
* Fix table indexing in `dwarf_search_unwind_table` by @ararslan in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/308
* Expose function-pointer-to-name API by @bjosv in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/299
* Add port for Linux on LoongArch by @tangyouling in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/316
* Add more POSIX polyfills for nix cross-build on win by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/314
* configure.ac: avoid bashisms by @thesamesam in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/315
* DWARF: avoid a data race by @compnerd in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/320
* skip latex2man check with --disable-documentation by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/318
* Skip init_mem_validate calls during remote unwind by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/317
* [Loongarch64] amend the LoongArch64's CMakeLists.txt and compiling error. by @shushanhf in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/322
* Update license in pal-single-threaded.c by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/325
* Fix to malloc call in tdep_get_elf_image by @jrmadsen in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/327
* Updated to determine PAGE_SIZE dynamically. by @dmoody256 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/330
* FreeBSD also uses these structs so do not hide them by @brd in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/334
* Unwind with pointer authentication on arm64 by @andrewkilroyarm in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/360
* Make some structs non-empty by @giordano in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/332
* Update based on MSVC static analyzer by @AaronRobinsonMSFT in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/333
* Add support for FreeBSD/PPC32 by @pkubaj in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/338
* Fix Travis CI link by @James-A-Clark in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/339
* Use #if defined where applicable by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/342
* Fix for FreeBSD aarch64 by @MikaelUrankar in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/344
* Run make check on arm64 on Travis CI by @James-A-Clark in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/347
* DWARF: avoid invalid memory access with invalid CFI by @compnerd in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/348
* fix incorrect store in AArch64 getcontext by @vtjnash in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/353
* avoid leaking registers across sigreturn by @vtjnash in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/354
* move Windows CI to Github Actions by @vtjnash in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/357
* Fix cross-compilation on win by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/358
* Use constant for array size in os-linux by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/359
* Swap build step order in action file by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/370
* Correct build failure by @andrewkilroyarm in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/369
* added coredump support for s390x by @tkoecker in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/373
* Allow an alternate LOG_DRIVER to be specified by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/368
* Remove bashisms from tests/check-namespace.sh by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/375
* Add autodetection of procfs_status type by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/367
* Add remote unwinding support for macOS by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/365
* Expose get_proc_info_in_range API by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/377
* Autodetect presence of elf_fpregset_t by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/380
* coredump: stop assuming .text and .eh_frame are both in the first segment of an ELF file by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/384
* Make `sigaltstack()` optional by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/381
* Add support for arm fp registers unwind by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/382
* updated dist to focal for s390x jobs by @dandotimujahid in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/385
* Fix typos by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/397
* Cross-build CI `make check` QEMU tweak by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/402
* Add RISC-V machine value in remote unwind by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/398
* Fix __SOFTFP__ case for arm getcontext by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/400
* Added support for unwinding from the vsyscall region by @kent-cheung-arm in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/408
* Stop the autotools nag about AC_CONFIG_MACRO_DIRS by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/406
* Fix `make distcheck` due to missing coredump header by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/411
* Fix undefined behavior issues in aarch64 by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/414
* Account for lr in aarch64's uc_addr by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/416
* Fix outdated prefix path by @h0lyalg0rithm in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/420
* tests/run-coredump-unwind: Skip test if no coredump has been created by @fweimer-rh in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/418
* Fix freebsd arm64 build by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/421
* Fix a few warnings by @am11 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/427
* fix more warnings by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/428
* [LoongArch64] Update the port to latest kernel ABI by @xen0n in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/415
* arm64: Add support for unwinding in SVE functions by @James-A-Clark in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/423
* check-namespace.sh: adjust aarch64 symbols by @bregma in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/430
* Updated to determine PAGE_SIZE dynamically for loongarch64 by @abushwang in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/433
* Gia64-test-nat.c: #include <signal.h> for sigaction() by @AdrianBunk in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/439
* update ci badges in the readme by @kasperk81 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/442
* Disable Ltest-init-local-signal on ia64 by @AdrianBunk in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/441
* Fix for unw_backtrace fast path does not work on x86_64 [https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/issues/440] by @gleocadie in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/444
* fix the way load offset is detected so it works with lld linker by @dmoody256 in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/448
* Remove the unused powerpc setcontext() dummies by @AdrianBunk in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/450
* README: Remove outdated information by @AdrianBunk in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/451
* Add unw_backtrace2 function by @gleocadie in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/435

## New Contributors
* @bjosv made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/298
* @iarspider made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/303
* @tangyouling made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/316
* @thesamesam made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/315
* @compnerd made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/320
* @shushanhf made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/322
* @jrmadsen made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/327
* @dmoody256 made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/330
* @brd made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/334
* @andrewkilroyarm made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/360
* @giordano made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/332
* @AaronRobinsonMSFT made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/333
* @James-A-Clark made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/339
* @MikaelUrankar made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/344
* @tkoecker made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/373
* @dandotimujahid made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/385
* @kent-cheung-arm made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/408
* @h0lyalg0rithm made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/420
* @fweimer-rh made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/418
* @xen0n made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/415
* @abushwang made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/433
* @AdrianBunk made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/439
* @gleocadie made their first contribution in https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/pull/444

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/libunwind/libunwind/compare/v1.6.2...v1.7.0

name: libunwind v1.3.2
body: Contains mincore / paged out memory fix from pull #167

name: libunwind 1.2.1
body: minor package fixes for tilegx, mips, others. Fixes missing include file issues.

name: libunwind 1.2
body:
What's new since 1.1:
- aarch64 port
- dwarf parsing improvements
- Fast stacktraces for aarch64 & arm
- tilegx port
- powerpc64 port
